lead_paragraph: Minnesota Twins outfielder Reynaldo Rodriguez, an All-Star at Triple-A last year, has been suspended 80 games following a positive test under baseball's minor league drug program.

headline.print_headline: Twins Minor Leaguer Suspended 80 Games for Positive Test
headline.main: Twins Minor Leaguer Suspended 80 Games for Positive Test
